description:
This week I start work on this bug https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1118457 So, my first step was to install multihost lab. I use devstack and follow instruction from http://devstack.org/guides/multinode-lab.html Everything looks fine until I run instances. It take ip's from both created networks, but nova-manage network list output looks like that:
id   	IPv4              	IPv6           	start address  	DNS1           	DNS2           	VlanID         	project        	uuid           
1    	10.4.128.0/20     	None           	10.4.128.2     	8.8.4.4        	None           	None           	None           	b9d67c27-c8d6-4a6d-aace-8e527ab4e933
2    	172.16.169.0/24   	None           	172.16.169.2   	8.8.4.4        	None           	None           	None           	3b795266-442a-4d29-8865-8e308b21bc76
title: Nova don't create input in mysql db when project get network

comments.content:
This week I start work on this bug https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1118457 So, my first step was to install multihost lab. I use devstack and follow instruction from http://devstack.org/guides/multinode-lab.html Everything looks fine until I run instances. It take ip's from both created networks, but nova-manage network list output looks like that:
id   	IPv4              	IPv6           	start address  	DNS1           	DNS2           	VlanID         	project        	uuid           
1    	10.4.128.0/20     	None           	10.4.128.2     	8.8.4.4        	None           	None           	None           	b9d67c27-c8d6-4a6d-aace-8e527ab4e933
2    	172.16.169.0/24   	None           	172.16.169.2   	8.8.4.4        	None           	None           	None           	3b795266-442a-4d29-8865-8e308b21bc76

comments.content: Please try to pursue this with help from the openstack mailing list until you have more details to describe a bug.  Thanks.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb
